document.docAuthor: Bolger, Thomas, Arroyo, Julio & Piotrowska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

subSubSection.paragraph:
Blattisocius Keegan, 1944
•
Blattisocius dentriticus (Berlese, 1918)
• Original name :
Lasioseius ( Lasioseius ) dentriticus Berlese, 1918
. • In :
Redia
, 13: 133. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Laelaps fimbriatus Halbert (Halbert, 1923)
,
Melichares dentriticus (Berlese)
( Cusack, 1974 ;
Cusack et al ., 1975
),
Blattisocius amboinensis (Oudemans) ( Curry, 1969a )
.

Irish Records : In sprouting potatoes ( Halbert, 1923 ); farm grain stores ( Cusack, 1974 ;
Cusack et al .,
Counties: Dublin, Kildare .

• Original name :
Blattiosocius keegani
[sic] Fox, 1947.
• In : Annals of the Entomological Society of America , 40: 599.

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Melichares keegani (Fox)
( Cusack, 1974 ;
Cusack et al ., 1975
; Emmanuel, 1977 ).
Counties: Kildare, Meath .

•
Blattisocius mali (Oudemans, 1929)
• Original name
Typhlodromus mali Oudemans, 1929
. • In: Entomologische Berichten , 8: 30. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Typhlodromus mali Oudemans
(
Turk & Turk , 1952
).
Counties: Dublin .

• Original name :
Lasioseius ( Lasioseius ) tarsalis Berlese, 1918
.

• In :
Redia
, 13: 134.

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Typhlodromus tineivorans Oudemans ( O’Farrell & Butler, 1948 )
,
Melichares tarsalis (Berlese)
( Cusack, 1974 ;
Cusack et al ., 1975
; Cusack & Brennan, 1976 ). Irish Records : Stored foodstuffs ( O’Farrell & Butler, 1948 ); farm and commercial grain stores and flour mills ( Cusack, 1974 ;
Cusack et al ., 1975
; Cusack & Brennan, 1976 ); pasture ( Tuohy, 1979 ); soil under Norway spruce ( Heneghan, 1994 ). Counties: Antrim, Kilkenny, Meath.

• Original name :
Lasioseius ( Lasioseius ) borealis Berlese, 1904
.

• In :
Redia
, 1: 259.

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Sejus borealis (Berlese) ( O’Neill, 1981 )
.
Counties: Dublin, Galway, Kildare, Mayo, Meath, Offaly, Wexford .

•
Cheiroseius curtipes ( Halbert, 1923 )
• Original name :
Lasioseius ( Episeius ) glaber var. curtipes Halbert, 1923
. • In : Journal of the Linnean Society ( Zoology ), 35: 370. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Lasioseius glaber Berl.
var
curtipes Halbert (Halbert, 1923
Irish Records : Wet moss ( Halbert, 1923 ).
Counties: Dublin .

• Original Name:
Lasioseius ( Lasioseius ) grandis Berlese, 1916
.

• In:
Redia
, 12: 34

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Episeius grandis (Berlese) ( Halbert, 1920 )
.
Irish Records : Saltmarsh and open habitats in estuary ( Halbert, 1920 ).
Counties: Dublin .

• Original name :
Epicrius laelaptoides Berlese, 1887
.

• In :
Acari , Myriopoda and Scorpiones
hucusque in Italia reperta
, 40: 10.

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Lasioseius ( Lasioseius ) laelaptoides (Berlese) ( Halbert, 1923 )
,
Lasioseius ( Episeius ) sphagni Halbert (Halbert, 1923)
. Irish Records : Under decaying wood and in
Sphagnum ( Halbert, 1923 )
. Counties: Dublin .

• Original name :
Hypoaspis necorniger Oudemans, 1903
.
• In : Entomologische Berichten , 1: 87.
Counties: Dublin, Wexford .

•
Cheiroseius serratus ( Halbert, 1915 )
• Original name : Paraseius
serratus Halbert, 1915
. • In : Proceedings of the Royal Irish Academy , 31: 78. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature: Paraseius
serratus Halbert (Halbert, 1915)
,
Episeius serratus Halbert ( Hull, 1918 )
.

Irish Records :
Sphagnum
( Halbert, 1915, Halbert upublished notes ); pasture on bog ( Longworth, 1973 ).
Counties: Down, Dublin, Kerry, Mayo .

• Original name :
Typhlodromus berlesei Oudemans, 1938
.
• In: Tijdschrift voor Entomologie , 81: 2.
Counties: Kildare, Mayo .

subSubSection.paragraph:
• Original name :
Lasioseius confusus Evans, 1958
.
• In : Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London , 131: 221.
Irish Records : Pasture on peat ( Whelan, 1976 ).
Counties: Kildare .

• Original name :
Seius muricatus Koch, 1839
.
• In : Deutschlands Crustaceen , Myriopoden und Arachniden . 1835–1844 . Regensburg, fasc. 24 (11).

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Seiulus muricatus (Koch) ( Halbert, 1915 )
.
Counties: Dublin, Kildare, Wicklow .

• Original name :
Hypoaspis ometes Oudemans, 1903
.
• In : Entomologische Berichten , 1: 100.
Counties: Dublin, Kildare .

• Original name :
Lasioseius ( Zercoseius ) penicilliger Berlese, 1916
.

• In :
Redia
, 12: 44.
Counties: Not specified.

•
Lasioseius spinosus Willmann, 1939
• Original name :
Lasioseius spinosus Willmann, 1939
. • In : Abhandlungen der Naturwissen -schaftlichen . Verein zu Bremen , 31: 52–500. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Thinoseius spinosus Willmann ( Healy & McGrath, 1998 )
.

Irish Records : Dry tidal debris and
Armeria
tussocks ( Healy & McGrath, 1998 ).
Counties: Wexford .
Platyseius Berlese, 1916

• Original name :
Ameroseius italicus Berlese, 1905
.

• In :
Redia
, 2: 234.

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature: Paraseius
italicus (Berlese) ( Halbert, 1915 )
, Paraseius
tenuipes Halbert (Halbert, 1915)
,
Lasioseius ( Episeius ) tenuipes Halbert
( Hull, 1918 ; Halbert, 1923 ),
Lasioseius ( Episeius ) italicus Berlese
( Hull, 1918 ; Halbert, 1923 ),
Platyseius tenuipes (Halbert)
(
Turk & Turk 1952
).
Irish Records : Moss in stream on partially submerged stones ( Halbert, 1915 ); streams and reservoir (Hal-
Counties: Clare, Dublin, Kildare, Mayo, Wexford, Wicklow .

•
Platyseius major ( Halbert, 1923 )
• Original name :
Lasioseius ( Episeius ) major Halbert, 1923
. • In : Journal of the Linnean Society ( Zoology ), 35: 373. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Lasioseius ( Episeius ) major Halbert (Halbert, 1923)
.
Irish Records : Stream ( Halbert, 1923 ).
Counties: Dublin .

•
Platyseius tendens (Schrank, 1803)
• Original name:
Acarus tendens Schrank, 1803
. • In: Fauna Boica , Durchgedachte Geschichte der in Baiern einheimischen und zahmen Thiere . Philipp Krüll, Universitätsbuchhändler, Landshut, 209. • Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Lasioseius ( Platyseius ) subglaber (Oudemans) ( Halbert, 1923 )
,
Platyseius subglaber (Oudemans)
( Wisdom, 2010 ,
Wisdom et al ., 2011
).

Irish Records :
Sphagnum
pools and bank of stream ( Halbert, 1923 ); raised bog ( Wisdom, 2010 ; Wisdom
Counties: Clare, Galway, Louth, Offaly, Wicklow .
Zercoseius Berlese, 1916

• Original name :
Seius spathuliger Leonardi, 1899
.
• In : Canestrini, G. (Ed.), Prospetto dell’Acarofauna Italiana . Part 8 . Stabilimento Prosperini, Padova, 923.

• Combinations/variations used in Irish literature:
Seiulus spathuliger (Leonardi) ( Halbert, 1915 )
,
Lasioseius spathuliger (Leonardi) ( Hull, 1918 )
. Irish Records : Moss ( Halbert, 1915, Bolger, in press ); amongst heather (Halbert unpublished notes); pasture on peat ( Whelan, 1976 ); nest of
Lasius flavus
and pasture (
Arroyo et al ., 2015
). Counties: Dublin , Kildare , Limerick , Mayo .
